p: The Screening cohort consisted of screening of 236 pupils (aged 7–22 years) and three staff members from three school buildings in the municipality of Virolahti in Kymenlaakso (between 27 November and 1 December 2017), which were selected due to reports of unusually frequent respiratory infections and absentees. Nasopharyngeal swabs and questionnaires were collected, when possible (Table 1). PCR positive swabs were utilized for molecular typing.
